ai-patthana21.43:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.43:0.3_0: Next there are persuasives and blood.
ai-patthana21.43:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for form to desire, affection, and infatuation.
ai-patthana21.43:2.1_0: Neither flattering nor forming form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-patthana21.43:3.1_0: Not taking pleasure in form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-patthana21.43:3.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
